Capitol .lvi.	Capitol .lvi.: Chapter 56.
De albater le qual accideys en le prepucii en le cap de la vergua e de corropcio e negror e adherencia del prepucii del cap de la vergua.	For whitening which occurs in the foreskin of the penis, and its corruption, blackening, and adhesion to the head of the penis:
Motas veguadas accideys aquest albater en la vergua e es eminencia de carn laga.	Small moles happen for this whitening in the penis, which is an elevation of soft flesh.
E de aquela una es maligna e autra es no-maligna.	And one is malignant while another isn't.
No-maligna, cove que suspendas am unci subtil e abscindas aquela entro que aquela mondes tota; e aprop pausa sobre aquela coto submirgit en enguent egipciac; e aprop aquel, cura le am enguent diafinicon entro que sia sanat.	If it isn't malignant, take a fine needle and cut that off so that you clean all of it; then put on some Egyptian ointment under which is placed the cut part; and after that cure it with ointment made from powdered borax until it is healed.
E si albater es maligna, de lega color, lahoras cove que tu aministres cauteri aprop la inscizio de lu e la razio de lu.	If the whitening is malignant, of blue colour, then you should apply a cautery to its incision and origin.
Mays si albater es en le prepuci del cap de la vergua no-circumcis, e la una partida de albater es dedintz le prepucii e l’autra partida es defora, lahoras cove que tu ostes albater le qual es dedintz al comensament entro que es consolidat; e lahora tu cura aquel deforo, quar quan tu curas aquel ensemps le prepuci, no es asegurat que no sia trinquat.	But if the whitening is in the foreskin of an uncircumcised penis and one part of it is inside the foreskin while another is outside, then you should remove that which is inside at the beginning so that it hardens; and then treat what is on the outside because when treating this along with the foreskin, there isn't assurance that it won't be torn.
E ja eysamen accideys en les genetius e en le prepuci negror e corruccio, adonc cove que tu conquavas tot aquo que ja es denigrat e que ja se vol corrompre o que ja es corrumput; e aprop lineys sobre aquel aprop aquo am mel, le qual es contusit am farina de scorsa de milgrana e de errs trissatz e crivellatz.	Certainly! Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E aprop cura aquel am l’autra curacio entro que sia sana.	And then provide that other cure until they are healed.
Mays si endeve flux de sanc, lahoras aministra cauteri lunar segon aquesta forma:	If there is an outflow of blood, then apply the lunar cautery according to this method:
quar cauteri juvatiu es a dos disposicios ensemps, so es a flux de sanc e a la plagua quan es corrumpuda.	The beneficial cautery is useful for two conditions: the flow of blood and when an ulcer becomes corrupted.
E si le cap de la vergua es corrodut e es destruit tot en la hora, lahoras cove que tu intrometas en lo meat del prepucii una canula de plom per so que le malaute urina per aquela.	If the head of the penis is destroyed and corroded beyond repair, you should insert a lead cannula into the foreskin so that the patient can urinate through it.
En la adherencia del prepucii am le cap de la vergua (et aquesta adherencia no accideys sino en aquel del qual le prepucii es sa, e sobre lu no es exhigida circumcizio; e quan accideys adherencia per plagua o per apostema) cove que excorjas am spatum obtus entro que sia dissolvut le liament e sia deliurat le cap de la vergua de tota partida.	In the case of an adhesion between the foreskin and the head of the penis (which only occurs when the foreskin is too long, and circumcision is not required; however, it can happen due to ulcers or abscesses), you should cut away the adherence with a blunt spatula until the bond is dissolved and the head of the penis is released from any tears.
E si es dificil desirnir aquelas exquisidament, lahoras cove que tu excorjes am spatum alcuna causa del cap de la vergua e del prepucii, e aysso es quar le prepucii, quan es subtil, fort leu es perforat per la sua subtilitat leugierament.	If it is difficult to separate them without causing harm, then you should cut away some of the head of the penis and foreskin. This is because, when the foreskin is thin, it can be easily perforated due to its delicate nature.
E aprop separa entre·l prepucii e·l cap de la vergua am dra7 de li subtil, le qual ja es mulhat en l’aygua frega per que no adherescan autra veguada.	And then separate the foreskin from the head of the penis with a fine thread, which has already been moistened in cold water so that it does not stick again.
E aprop sia curat am vi stiptic entro que sia consolidat.	And then clean it with a styptic [substance] until it is consolidated.
Capitol .lvii.	Chapter .57.
De mundificacio dels enfants e de la curacio de aquo que accideys ad aquels de circumcisio.	On the cleanliness of infants and the treatment of complications arising from circumcision.
Circumcisio no es solucio de continuitat ayssi cum las autras plaguas: mays empero cum sia de la nostra operacio e de nostra voluntat, e lus de aquela sia propriament en les enfants, es necessari que asignem en aquela milhor operacio e via pus leugiera perdusent a salut.	Circumcision is not solely for continence, as with other surgeries: but since it is our operation and our will, and theirs by their own accord, it is necessary that we assign to it the best operation and the lightest way possible towards health.
Donc dic que les antics no diyssero circumcisio en alcu dels lors libres, quar no n’usan en las suas leys, e no es sino quar havem aquisit per speriment, la qual causa es que yeu he atrobat la major partida dels artifexs e dels barbies usar circumcisir e mundificacio am novacula e am torores; e usan de liament am fiel e de inscizio am la ungla.	Therefore, they say that the ancients did not mention circumcision in any of their books, as it was not used in their laws, and it is only something we have acquired through experimentation. The reason for this is that I have found that most surgeons and barbers perform circumcisions and cleanliness with a novacula [razor] and torus [a curved instrument], and they use ligatures made of sinew and incisions with the nail.
E yeu ja he prohadas totas aquestas manieras e no atrobegui milhor mondificacio am forfexs, am liament am fiel que en mondificacio cum la ungla, quar motas vetz efugeys la codena pus desus, quar la codena del prepucii a dos tunicas, e roman la tonica pus dejos, e fort leu es forsat ad autra inscizio e dolor sicura.	Here is the translation of the provided text:
E am mundificacio le qual es fayta per alphecati, e es digital, del qual usan les sabatiers, no es segurada la inscizio de la extremitat del membre viril, quar fort leu intra en le trau de lu.	And the cleaning process which is done with alpeca, a type of paste used by cobblers, does not guarantee a safe incision at the end of the male member, as it easily enters its tract.
Mays en la operacio am ungla, fort leu obazeys ferr e corromp la tua operacio.	During the operation, be careful not to touch iron, as it may easily ruin your surgery.
E la codena del enfant es breu per natura, e motas veguadas nays en tal manieyra que no ha necessitat de mondificacio, e yeu he vist aquel.	And the boy's urethra is short by nature, and in many cases, it doesn't require any cleaning or modification; I have witnessed such a situation.
Mays de la mondificacio que·s fa am forfexs e liamentz am fiel, la bontat, experiment descrobic a mi, quar las forfexs so de proporcional inscizio, per aquo quar la acuitat que es desus es ayssi cum la acuitat que es dejos; e donc cum tu premes la tua ma so proporcionadas dos acuitatz, e inscideysso segon una comperacio en un temps; e es fayta compressio del fiel am figura contenent la codena de la vergua de tota partida, am le qual no catz error de tot.	When performing the cleaning procedure using scissors and a thread, I have discovered through experience that it is beneficial to do so; the scissors provide proportionate incisions as their sharpness above matches the one below. Thus, when you press your hand down, two sharps are brought together in a controlled manner, making an incision at once. This technique ensures precision by compressing the thread around the penis's urethra without causing any harm.
E la manieyra de la operacio primeyra es que tu fassas estar le enfant majorment si es de aquels que entendo un petit, que no fassas sino que tu lies le fiel en la sua vergua tant solament, e que leysses aquel entro al autra dia.	The first step in the operation is to ensure that the boy is mature enough to understand and follow instructions if he is capable of doing so; simply tie the thread around his penis loosely without making any incisions yet, and leave it there until the next day.
E aprop fay aquel alegrar en tota aquela manieyra que es a tu possibla de aquo que recep la sua intelligencia.	And then make him feel comfortable in every way you possibly can, as far as his condition allows.
E aprop fa aquel estar entre las tuas mas estatuir preparadament, e no sia ges cezent; e occulta las forfexs en la tua ma o dejos le tieu pe, que l’enfant no veia aquelas ni degun autre dels instruments.	Then have him stay between your arms, prepared and still; there should be nothing unsettling. Hide the forceps in your hand or behind your foot so that the child does not see them or any of the other instruments.
E aprop entremet la tua ma a la vergua de lu e suffla en la codena, e tira aquela entro que sia eyssit le cap de la vergua, e aprop mondifica aquel de aquo que es agregat en ela de sordicia.	Then insert your hand into his rectum and blow into the tube; pull it out when you see the baby's head emerging, and clean off any dirt or filth that is attached to it.
E aprop lia le loc signat am fiel dobla, e aprop ligua pus bas de aquel un petit le segon liament, e aprop te am le dit pous e endic tieu le loc del liament dejos am bona retencio, e inscideys entre dos liaments.	Then bind the marked area with a double cord; below that, tie another small one, and then take your middle finger and press down on the space between the two ligatures to keep them in place.
E aprop eleva la codena sus leugierament e estratz le cap de la vergua; e aprop leyssa le sanc corre petit e petit, quar es milhor ; e pausa polvera desus e sobre la polvera pausa drap en le qual es spandut mugol de huou coyt en ayguaros concosit am oli rozat recent bo; e layssa aquel sobre aquel entro al autra dia; e cura aquel am curacio entro que sia sanat.	Then lift the tube slightly and extract the baby's head, allowing a little blood to drip out slowly, which is better; sprinkle powder over it and on top of the powder place some cloth that has been soaked in hot chicken broth with fresh rose oil, then leave this on for another day before treating the wound until it heals.
La forma de las forfexs a mondificacio, aquesta es la forma:	The shape of the scissors should be modified, this is how it should look like:
Sian las unas extramitatz no-talhantz e las autras sian talhant, que non sia yssit le ram del clau, e sia la longitut de las doas acuitatz ayssi cum la longitut de dos manubres engualment.	One end of the scissors should be untapered and the other tapered, ensuring that the inner curve is not too sharp, with both cutting edges being equal in length to twice the length of the handle.
Mays la error en mundificacio es quar fort leu efugeys la codena intrinseca tota, o partida de lu deves la inscizio.	Be careful during the modification process not to accidentally remove or damage any part of the intrinsic cord that runs along the scissors; it should remain intact throughout the incision.
Donc cove que tu extendas aquela de la tua hora am la tua ungla denant la apostemacio del loc e que inscidas aquela segon equalitat.	Ensure that you expand the scissors gradually from your position, leading with the front blade towards the wound's location and incise it precisely according to its alignment.
E si no la podes tenir am la tua ungla, lahoras extratz aquela am unci e inscideys aquela.	If you cannot hold it with your nail, then use pliers to extract the scissors and proceed to incise.
Mays si son passatz tres dias, e roman aquo que es imflat dejos la vergua apostemat, lahoras tu leyssa aquo entro que sia cedat le apostema caut, e excorja aquel am fecilitat, e inscidex aquel segon que a tu es preparat.	But if three days have passed and there remains an inflamed abscess below the surgical wound, then you should wait until the abscess has softened before excising it with ease; cauterize that area as needed.
E guarda te del cap de la vergua, quar no nosera a lu aquo.	And take caution not to touch the tip of the abscess, for it will be harmful to you.
E donc cura aquel am aquo que la plagua consolida de las polveras las quals havem recomtadas en le tractat de las polveras.	And therefore cure that which has a plague, use the powders we have mentioned in our treatise on powders.
E si es inscidit de la codena sobre mesura, e obezeys a las partidas desus, aquo no notz a lu.	And if it is necessary to cut into the vein with precision, and you heed the instructions given above, this will not harm them.
E mays cura aquel am aquo que havem dit entro que sia sanat.	And further cure him with what we have said within so that he may be healed.

De curacio de urina retenguda en la vesiqua.	On the treatment of retained urine in the bladder." 
Retencio de urina en la vesica es fayta per oppulacio fayta per peyra o per sanc congilat, o per poyre o per carnada, e semblantz ad aquels de aquo que havem dit de las manieyras de curacio en la divisio.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
E si no es dissolvuda la urina, e veses retencio de lu esser per peyra le qual ja es en le col de la vesica, lahoras cove que le malaute sia encorbat sobre les sieus denolhs.	Under these circumstances if urine is not draining and the patient experiences retention due to a stone which might be located in the bladder neck, it is recommended that the patient should bend over their knees.
E aprop conponeys les pes de aquel sobre le sieu dos e extendas le sieu ventre de la partida pus desus del sieu dos, e le malaute estrengua le sieu ale tant quant es a lu possible.	Next, place the patient's feet on their back and stretch out their belly from the part above the back, and have the patient grip their own ear as much as they can.
Donc lahoras le col de la vesica es costreyt ha espulsio de la peyra a las partidas detras, per que la urina es absolta.	Then the neck of the bladder will be constricted for the expulsion of the stone towards the back parts, so that urine is released.
E si no es dissolvuda am aquo que havem dit he vehement es fayta la causa sobre le malaute, lahoras cove que aministres extraccio de lu am instrument le qual es apelat siringua, del qual aquesta es la forma: Sia de argent e sia subtil leon conquau, ayssi cum canula de pena de ausel am subtilitat de ray lonc en similitut d’un palm e mig, al qual sia cana subtil en le cap de lu.	And if it is not dissolved with what we have said and the cause is very intense for the patient, then you must administer extraction using an instrument which is called a syringe, of which this is the form: It should be made of silver and have a fine lion-shaped nozzle, just like a bird feather with the length of a ray that's one palm long, to which a thin tube is attached at its head.
E la manieyra del eyssiment de la urina per aquel es que prenguas le fiel doblat e lies en la extramitat de lu lana o coto per bona liadura; e entrometas las extramitatz del fiel en la partida dejos de la ciringua, e inscideys am las forfexs si superflueys alcuna causa de la lana, mays intromet la en la canula am vehemencia E aprop enongeys la ciringua am boder e am album de huou.	The way to extract urine using this is that you take the bent wire and wrap thread or cotton around its end for a good binding; then insert the wire's ends into the part below the syringe, cutting any superfluous cause of the thread with scissors, but be sure not to cut the wire itself as you insert it into the tube with force. Then cover the syringe with a board and egg white.
E fay cezer le malaute sobre la selha, e embroca la vesiqua de lu e la vergua am olis umitz, e oli de oliva e ayguaros.	Under the buttocks, make a pillow out of moistened oil and olive oil, and let the patient lay down on it while you press on their bladder and penis.
E aprop entromet la ciringua am facilitat entro que pervengua a la razit de la vergua; e aprop dobla la vergua desus a la partida del embelic; e aprop empelleys la ciringua dintz aquela; e aprop empelleys aquela entro que pervengua a la vesica, e aquela centa le malaute esser pervenguda a la causa vuoda, e no es fayt asso segon aquest orde, sino le meat en le qual va a tortuositat.	Then carefully insert the syringe into the base of the penis with ease until you reach the root; next bend the penis upwards towards the navel; and gently push the syringe inside it; then push the syringe further in until you reach the bladder, and know that the patient has reached the source of their condition (i.e., the cause is not empty/void), unless there is a bending or curve in the tube as such.
E aprop exten le fiel am la lana petit a petit, quar la urina siec la lana.	And then remove bile drop by drop with wool, since urine is like wool.
Aprop extratz aquela e fay per curacio urina, e usa ciringua, no cesses fer aquo e usa ciringua entro que sia evacuada la vesica e le malaute atrobe alleviacio.	Then extract that and make a remedy out of urine, using the syringe continuously to drain the bladder until it is empty and the patient finds some relief again.
Capitol .lix.	Chapter 59.
De qualitat de clisterizacio de la vezica am clampcedra e am semblantz instrumentz les quals sian acordants ad aquo.	On the quality of bladder irrigation with egg whites and similar instruments suitable for such a purpose.
Quan accideys en la vesica ulceracio o apostema, o sanc congilat en aquela, o es coartat poyredura, e vols en aquela destillar ayguas e medicinas, lahoras sia fayt am instrument le qual es apelat clampcedra, e aquesta es la forma de lu:	When there is an ulcer or abscess in the bladder, or when blood has coagulated within it, or when pus has accumulated and you want to irrigate with water and medicine, then use the following instrument called a "clampcedra". Its shape is as follows...
sino que en la extramitat de lu es sorda, so es clausa.	Sino que en la extramitat de lu es sorda, so es clausa.
Et en aquela so tres traucs: dos de la una partida , ayssi quo vezes.	Et en aquela so tres traucs: dos de la una partida , ayssi quo veces.
En le comensament es loc concau, en le qual es aquo que es enpellit, e sia segon quantitat que oppile aquel, ses addicio, entro que quan alcuna causa es ab aquel tirada de las humiditatz, sia atirada, e quan es expellida, am aquo sia atirada, e quan es expellit lonc, segon que fa clampcedra am la qual es phicat naphta en las batalhas de mar.	Here is my translation of the first source sentence: 
Donc cum tu vols prohicir humiditatz en la vesica, entromet la extremitat de clapcedra en la humiditat, e atira am aquel aquo que es empellit a las partidas desus, quar la humiditat es atirada en la conquavitat de clapcedra.	When you want to draw out moisture from the bladder, insert the tip of a glass tube into the moisture, and suck with that water which is driven towards the above parts, for the moisture is drawn into the cavity of the glass tube.
E aprop entromet la extramitat de clapcedra en la vergua segon que havem recomtat en la ciringua; e aprop empelleys la humiditat am aquo que empelleys, quar aquela humiditat perve a la vesica tantost, e le malaute cent aquela.	Then insert the tip of the glass tube into the penis as we have described in the surgery section, and suck out the moisture with that water you're using to draw it out, for that moisture reaches the bladder immediately, and the patient will feel it.
Forma del cristeri subtil am le qual la vesica es cristerizada, e es aquela la forma:	The shape of the catheter used to empty the bladder is subtle, and this is its form:
E sia fayta de argent o de lato, de la qual le cap pus aut sia semblant a petita pluma, e dejos lu cana dedintz liament.	It is made of silver or brass, with its top side resembling a small feather, and you should hollow it out slightly inside.
E aprop pren vesica de moto, e pausa en aquela la humiditat que vols cristirizar en la vesica, e aprop lia aquela entre dos am fort liguatura am fiel doble, e escalfa aquela humiditat sobre le foc.	Then take a bladder of a goat and place in it the moisture you want to catheterize into the bladder; then tie that closed with two strong cords using double thread, and heat that moisture over fire.
E aprop entromet la extremitat del cristeri en la vergua.	Then insert the tip of the catheter into the penis.
E aprop estrenh la tua ma sobre la vesica am la humiditat am strectura descent entro que·l malaute centa que aquela humiditat ja es pervenguda a la vesica.	Then hold your hand firmly over the bladder with the moisture and press it down until the patient feels that the moisture has reached the bladder.
Mays si a tu no es present vesica, lahoras tu pren una pessa de parguames e fay de aquel cercle; e perfora aquel de tota la sua retonditat; e aprop entromet fiel fort en aquels traucs, ayssi quo so revolgut; e aprop agregua le cercle ayssi quo es agreguat alsofatur, pus que tu pausas en aquel aquo que tu vols de las humiditatz, e olis e ayguas.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E aprop tu lia aquel en le instrument e fay am aquel ayssi cum has fayt am la vesica, e exprescio am la tua ma entro que la humiditat pervengua a la vesica.	And then you tie him on the operating table and do so as you did with the bladder, press down with your hand to prevent moisture from entering the bladder.

De extraccio de peyra.	Here's my translation of the provided text: 
Nos ja havem dit en la divisio las specias de peyra e curacio de lu am medicinas, e la diferencia entre peyra engendrada en los ronhos e peyra engendrada en la vesica, e les senhals de aquela.	Nos ja havem dit en la divisio las specias de peyra e curacio de lu am medicinas: 
E havem dit la peyra en la qual catz operacio am ma, e seccio.	And we have mentioned the stone (calcification) during which any operation with a knife occurs.
E la peyra engendrada en la vesica propriament es aquela que es ficada en la vesica.	The stone that is generated within the bladder itself is the one that remains lodged in the bladder.
E yeu so narrant aquel am exposicio manifesta e abreviacio.	And I have described this with an explicit explanation and abbreviation.
Donc dic que peyra engendrada en la vesica majorment ve als enfantz; e dels senhals de lu es que la urina que es eyssida de la vesica es semblant a aygua en la sua subtilitat, e apar en aquela arena; e le malaute fregua la sua vergua, e motas veguadas pen, e aprop es dressada; e am aquo yeys foro le cul en motz de aquels.	So I say that the stone generated in the bladder primarily affects children; and one of its signs is that the urine excreted from the bladder resembles water in its subtlety, and appears with a cloudy appearance; and the patient scratches their penis, often feeling pain, and it becomes swollen; and because of this, many have had surgery to remove the foreskin.
E es laugiera la sanacio dels enfants de aquela entro que han conseguitz xiiii ans; e es dificil curacio en les viels.	And it is rare for children with this condition to recover after they have reached 14 years of age, and healing becomes difficult in the elderly.
Mays en les joves es migiera per aquo quar es entre aquels.	In younger individuals, it is easier to cure because their bodies are still developing among other reasons.
E de aquel del qual la peyra es major e la curacio es pus leugiera; E si es pauca, es contraria ad aquela.	And for the one with a larger stone, recovery is more straightforward. If it is small in size, the healing process is often opposed.
Donc cum pervenem a la curacio de aquela, cove al comensament de aquela que mondifiquem le malaute am cristeri le qual extragua tota la fenda la qual es en les sieus budels; quar aquela fenda alcunas veguadas prohibeys la envencio de la peyra deves la inquisicio de lu.	When we arrive at the cure for this condition, it is essential that we modify the patient's diet by increasing their intake of sharp wines, which completely drain the humidity from their intestines; because this moisture sometimes prevents the stone from forming due to its investigation.
E aprop sia pres le malaute am les sieus pes e sia contosit e maugut enjos per so que la peyra descenda al preon de la vesica, o que saute de loc aut alcunas veguadas.	Here is my translation of the provided text:
E aprop fay aquel cezer entre las tuas mas preparat, e las mas de lu sian dejos las coysas de lu, per so que la vesica tota sia fayta declinant a las partidas dejos.	And then make him stop between your prepared hands, and his hands should be placed under his thighs, so that the bladder can completely descend into the lower parts.
E aprop perquier aquela e tota aquela deforo.	And then pull it upwards along with everything else outside.
Donc si sentes la peyra en l’espazi, lahoras tu te coyta tantost am seccio sobre lu.	So if you feel the stone in the space, then immediately make an incision over it.
E si no catz de tot dejos le tieu tocament, lahoras cove que tu untes am oli le tieu dit indic de la ma sinistra, si malaute es enfant, o le dit miga si es jove complit, e entrometas aquel en le sieu cul.	And if it does not come out completely with your touch, then you must grease your left index finger with oil (if the patient is a child) or your middle finger (if they are an adult), and insert it into their rectum.
E perquier de la peyra entro que stia dejos le tieu dit.	And pull the stone upwards until it is under your finger.
E converteys aquela petit a petit entro al col de la vesica.	And turn it little by little towards the neck of the bladder.
E aprop prem sobre aquel am lo tieu dit, e expelleys aquel a las partidas defora ves le loc del qual vos la seccio.	Then press on it with your finger and expel it to the outside parts beyond the place where you made the incision.
E comanda al ministra que prema la vesica am la sua ma; e comanda a un autra ministra que am la sua ma dextra extenda les genetius a las partidas desus, e am la sua autra ma remaugua la codena la qual es dejos les genetius, en partida del loc en le qual se fa la seccio.	Instruct the attendant to press on the bladder with their hand; and command another attendant to use their right hand to pull back the scrotum outwards, while using their other hand to hold down the penis in the part below where the incision is made.
E aprop entromet espatum be inscident del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And now introduce a spatula by making an incision; this is its shape:
e scindeys en lu aquo que es entre·l cul e·ls genetius, no en le mieg loc, abantz al latz de la coyssa sinistra; e sia la seccio sobre aquela peyra e·l tieu dit sia en le cul, e sia fayta seccio transversa, per que la seccio defora sia ampla e dedintz streyta segon la quantitat que egrecio de la peyra sia a lu possibla, e no major, quar fort leu comprem le tieu dit le qual es en le cul la peyra deves la seccio, e es foro-getada ses defacultat.	Cut it in what is between the anus and the testicles, not in the middle but towards the left side; make the incision over that stone and your finger should be inside the anus, make a transverse section so that the external section is wide and narrow inside according to the size of the stone you can extract, and no bigger, since it will press hard on your finger which is inside the anus where the stone must be cut, and its difficulty is forgotten.
E sapias que de la peyra es alcuna a la qual so angle e margers, per que le eyssiment de lu es fayt deficil per aquo.	Know that some stones have angles and edges, which makes their extraction difficult due to this.
E de aquela aquo es leon semblant a glan, e es redonda, e es fayt de lu leugier eyssiment.	And of these, there is one resembling a hazelnut, it's round, and its extraction is easier.
Donc si es aquela al qual so angles e marger, ajusta en la fissura.	So if that one has edges and angles, adapt it to the fracture.
E si no es ayssi foro-getada, lahoras cove que tu engenes sobre aquel, o que strenguas sobre aquel am gesti decentment, la extremitat del qual sia ayssi cum lima am le qual strenguas sobre la peyra, e no evasesca de lu; o que entrometas dejos lu instrument subtil de curvada extremitat.	And if it is not like that, know that you have to put something on top of it or press upon it decently with your hand, the end of which should be like a lime with which you can grind over the stone and don't move away from it; or introduce below an instrument with a curved end.
Mays si tu no podes sobre aquel, lahoras tu amplifica le trauc un petit, e si tu veus flux de sanc, abscindeys en strenh aquel am vitriol trissat.	But if you cannot manage this, then you slightly enlarge the wound, and if you see blood flow, apply ground vitriol to it vigorously.
Mays si la peyra es mays de una, lahoras al comensament tu impelleys la ma a la boca de la vesica, e aprop inscideys sobre lu; e aprop impelleys un petit aprop aquo; e semblantment fay si son motas mays de doas.	But if the stones are more than one, then at first you push your hand into the bladder's opening and cut it there; then you push something small next to this [stone]; and similarly do so if there are more than two stones.
E si es peyra mot gran, lahoras ignorancia es que tu inscidas aquel am gran seccio, quar accideys al malaute una de doas causas: o que mora o que endevengua a lu destillacio de urina continuabla, per aquo quar le loc no es de tot consolidat.	And if the stone is very large, it is wrong to cut it with a big section [of the blade], as this will cause the patient one of two outcomes: either death or continuous dribbling of urine, because the wound is not fully consolidated.
Mays aministra expulcio de lu entro que sia fora-getada, o engenia en la fractura de lu am las forfexs entro que extragua aquela en pessas.	But arrange that it be removed if it is overlooked, or devise a way to break it with the scissors until you remove it in pieces.
Donc cum tu auras cumplit la tua opperacio, lahoras omple la plagua de enses de aloe e de sanc de drago, e strenh aquel.	Once you have completed the operation, fill the wound with juice from aloe leaves and dragon's blood [plant], then bind it tightly.
E pausa sobre aquel drap enfus en oli e vi, o en oli rozat e aygua frega, per so que apostema caut sia cedat.	Place over it cloth soaked in oil and wine, or rose oil and warm water, to prevent the formation of pus.
E aprop resupina le malaute sobre le sieu col, e no deslias le liament entro al tertz dia.	And then turn the patient onto their back, do not remove the bindings for three days.
E cum aquel auras desliat, embroca le loc am aygua e mot oli, e aprop cura aquel am enguent diafinicon e am enguent diabazilicon entro que sia sanat.	Once you have unbound them, clean the area with water and plenty of oil, then treat it with ointment made from alum and verdigris until they are healed.
Mays si en la plagua accideys apostema caut, adhust e corrosiu, e de aquel semblantz ayssi cum si le sanc es en la vesica congelat, e per lu es la hurina prohibida (e aquo es conogut per la egressio del sanc am urina), a donc entromet lo tieu dit en la plagua e extratz aquel sanc, quar si roman provoca la vesica a corropcio de la vesica e de lu putrefaccio.	But if the swelling becomes hot and corrosive, like when blood is trapped in the bladder as ice and prevents urination (which can be determined by observing bloody urine), then insert your finger into the swelling and draw out that blood, for if it remains, it will cause the bladder to become corrupted and putrid.
E aprop lava la plagua am vi agre, aygua e sal, e am opposicio a tota specia, am aquo que conveneys a lu de la curacio entro que sia sanat.	Then wash the swelling with vinegar, water, and salt, using any remedy that you believe is appropriate for curing it until they are healed.
E cove en las horas de tota la curacio que tu lies amdos las coyssas e ajustes las medicinas las quals so pausadas sobre le loc.	Cover during all the healing process both thighs with cloth and adjust the medicines that are applied on the area.
E si la peyra es petita e es en le meat de la vergua, e es ficat en lu, e eyssement de urina es prohibit, lahoras cura aquel am aquo que yeu recomti denant que pervenguas a seccio, quar tropas veguadas per aquesta curacio yest acusat de seccio; e ja yeu e esproat aquo, e es que tu prenguas un perforador de ferr alfelut, del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if the stone is small and located in the urethra, making urination impossible, then treat it with what I previously recommended to avoid surgery, because surgeons who employ this cure are accused of practicing surgery; and I have experienced that, take a red-hot iron instrument shaped like this:
de triangulada extramitat, agut, ficat en fust.	From the triangular extremity, sharp, stuck in wood.
E aprop pren fiel, e lia am aquel la vergua dejos la peyra per so que no retorne a la vesica.	Then take flax and tie it to that rod, placing them under the stone so that they cannot return to the bladder.
E aprop entromet le ferr en la vergua, perforant am fecilitat entro que·l perforador vengua ad aquela peyra.	Then insert the iron into the rod, piercing it with ease until the perforator reaches that stone.
E revolveys le perforador am la tua ma en aquela peyra petit a petit, e tu perforsa la perforacio de lu entro que fassas aquel del autra part penetrar; quar la urina tantost es absolta.	And turn the perforator with your hand on that stone gradually, piercing it until you make that one from the other side penetrate; because urine is now being released.
E aprop prem la tua ma sobre aquo que es romas de la peyra de la partida deforo de la vergua, quar aquela es trinquada, e es foro-getada am la urina, e le malaute es sanat.	Then press your hand on what is broken off the stone outside of the rod, for it is cracked and blocked by urine; and the patient is healed.
Mays si aquesta curacio no es a tu aparelhada per alcuna causa la qual prohibeys de aquela, lahoras lia un fiel dejos la peyra, e autra fiel desus la peyra.	But if this treatment is not available to you for any reason that prohibits it, then tie a piece of flax under the stone and another piece of flax over the stone.
E aprop encideys sobre la peyra en aquela vergua entre doas liaduras.	Then cut through the stone with that rod between the two ligatures.
E aprop extratz aquela.	Then extract it.
E aprop deslia le liament e mondifica le sanc congilat, le qual es fayt en la plagua.	And then untie the binding and clean the congealed blood from the wound.
E no es necessari liament de fiel dejos la peyra, sino per que no retorne a la vesica, e l’autre liament desus sino, quar quan es desliat le fiel aprop la egrecio de la peyra, la codena retorna a son loc e cobra la plagua.	It is not necessary to keep the binding on their bladder stone; instead, they need only the one above it so that when you untie the one around the bile duct and the passage of the stone, then the catheter returns to its place and treats the wound.
E per aquo es a tu necessari quan lias le fiel desus, que tu eleves la codena a las partidas desus, o que retorne deves le tieu compliment, e cobra la plagua ayssi co havem dit.	And this is why you must keep the catheter above the bile duct binding elevated; if it returns downward to its original position, then the wound will heal as we have described.

De extraccio de peyra de las femnas.	Chapter 61 appears to be titled "On the Extraction of Bladder Stones from Females." Would you like me to translate any specific instructions or information related to this chapter? I can provide a more detailed translation if required.
Peyra en las femnas pauc es engendrada.	Bladder stones in females are rarely formed." Do you want me to continue translating this text? I can provide a more comprehensive translation if there's additional context you'd like to share.
Mays si ve peyra ad alcuna de aquelas, lahoras dificil es la curacio de lu, e es prohibida per tropas manieyras.	When bladder stones do appear in some females, their treatment is often challenging and can be approached in various ways." Shall I proceed with translating the subsequent lines? Feel free to provide any further details if you wish to delve deeper into this medieval medical text.
La una de lor es quar la femna fort leu es verges.	La una de lor es quar la femna fort leu es verges.
E la segonda es quar tu no trobas femna be scient que descroba si meteyssa al metge quan es casta, o es de las femnas haventz maritz.	And secondly, if you cannot find a woman who is suitable for uncovering the patient's private parts when they are chaste or those of women with husbands.
La tersa es quar tu no hatrobas femna be sabent aquesta art, majorment la operacio am ma.	Thirdly, if you cannot find a woman who is proficient in this medical art, especially when it comes to the operation with the hand.
E la quarta es que·l loc de la seccio sobre peyra en las femnas es longinc del loc de la peyra, per que indigeys de seccio preonda, e en aquela es temor.	And fourthly, the location of the incision over the stone in women is far from the site of the stone itself, so when you need to make an incision and there are concerns about it, and in this case, it is feared.
Mays si necessitat provoca a tu ad aquo, lahoras cove que tu prenguas una femna metga be scient, e pauc es atrobada.	But if you find yourself in need of performing this procedure, then know that it is best to seek out a female doctor who is knowledgeable and skilled, though they are hard to come by.
Mays si tu es privat de aquela, lahoras cerca metga quast e subtil, o presenta una femna matrona be esenhada en le feyt de las femnas, o femna que en aquesta art ennueys partida del art.	But if you are unable to find such a female doctor, then look for a gentle and clever male physician, or present the patient to an experienced matron who is well-versed in women's affairs, or even a woman who has some experience with this specific medical practice.
Donc fay aquela present, e comanda a lu que fassa tot aquo que tu li mandaras, de la enquisicio sobre la peyra al comensament; la qual causa es que reguarde si la femna es verges, lahoras cove que meta lo sieu dit en le cul de lu e quiera la peyra.	So make the presentation and instruct them to do as you command, from the examination for the stone at the beginning; this is done to check if the woman is a virgin, so it requires putting their finger into her anus and feeling for the stone.
Donc si atroba aquela, coarte aquela dejos le sieu dit, e lahoras comanda a lu que inscida sobre aquela.	Therefore, if you find that one, cut it off below its exit, and then order them to sit on it.
Mays si no es verge, lahoras comanda a la matrona que entrometa lo sieu dit en le conh de la malauta e enquiera sobre la peyra, pus que pausa la sua ma sinistra sobre la vesica, e comprem aquela am bona comprecio.	If she is not a virgin, then instruct the midwife to insert her finger into the patient's vagina and feel for the stone, while placing their left hand on the bladder and pressing with good pressure.
Donc si atroba aquela, lahoras cove que gradantment maugua aquela de l’orrifici de la vesica a las partidas dejos am somman de la sua vertut entro que pervengua am aquel a la razit de la coyssa.	So, if you find it, then gently pull on it to extract it from the bladder's opening towards the area below with all your might until it reaches the root of the thigh.
E aprop inscida sobre aquela apposicio de la maytat del conh deves la razit de la coyssa de qualque part sia a lu parada e cent la peyra en aquela partida, e·l dit de lu no sia remaugut de la peyra coartan dejos lu.	Then press on that application in the middle of the vagina near the root of the thigh wherever it is stuck and feel for the stone there, ensuring their finger is not pushed away by the stone when you cut below it.
E la seccio sia pauca al comensament; e aprop entrometa lo ray sobre aquela seccio, e si sent la peyra, lahoras ajuste en seccio segon la quantitat la qual sap que la peyra sira getada de aquela.	And if the incision is small at first, then insert the knife into that section and feel for the stone; adjust the length of the cut according to how much you know the stone will be expelled from there.
E sapias que las specias de peyra son motas: quar de aquelas es pauca e gran, e leon e aspra, e longua e redonda, e havent ramps.	Know that there are many types of stones: some are small and large, rough like a lion's tooth, others are long and round, and some have points.
Donc tu sapias quantas specias so de lu per aquo que tu signifiques sobre aquo que vols.	Therefore, you should know how many spices are needed for what you want to signify.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, ajusta en le loc vetriol trissat e te aquela per una hora entro que sia abscindit le sanc, e aprop retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	And if you wish to induce a flow of blood, place crushed vitriol on the area and cover it for an hour until the blood is drawn out, then return to your operation once the stone has been forgotten.
E fay que prepares am tu dels instrumentz les quals e ditz en la extraccio de peyra en les homes, per so que sias ajudat per aquels en la tua operacio.	Have one of your assistants prepare the instruments you mentioned for extracting stones from men, so that they may aid you in your operation.
E si tu veus flux de sanc, e sabes que la expulcio del sanc es de la arceria que es insciza, lahoras tu pausa polvera sobre le loc e estrenh aquel am pulvils e strictura descent, e no iteras aquo; e layssa la peyra e no extraguas aquela, quar fort leu morira la malauta.	And if you wish to induce a flow of blood and know that the bleeding comes from an incised artery, then apply powder to the area and press it with pads and tight bandages, but do not repeat this process; leave the stone alone and do not extract it, for the patient will soon die.
E aprop cura la plagua.	And then treat the plague.
Donc cum es cedada la acuitat del sanc aprop alcus jorns, e·l loc se poyreys, lahoras tu retorna a la tua operacio entro que la peyra sia fora-getada.	Once the sharpness of the blood has ceased after some days, and the area is hardened, you may return to your operation once the stone has been forgotten.
Capitol lxii.	It appears that this text is divided into chapters or sections, with "Capitol lxii" likely indicating Chapter 62. Is there another line from the text you would like me to translate?
De seccio sobre ernia acoza.	De seccio sobre ernia acoza" translates to "Regarding the surgery for hernia repair.
Hernia ayguoza no es sino agregacio de humiditat en le ciphac blanc lo qual es dejos la codena dels genetius contenent le huou, e es nompnat ciphac.	Hernia acoza" refers to an accumulation of fluid in the white membrane that surrounds and protects the testicles, which is known as the tunica vaginalis.
E alcunas veguadas es en le propri pannicol le qual a lu preparec natura en la partida del huou, entro que sia cuyat que ja es autre huou; e es la codena del genetiu entre le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, e no es aquo sino tart.	In some cases, the hernia is found in the proper fatty tissue that nature prepares as a partition for the testicle, when there already exists another testicle; this is the tunica vaginalis propria, which we have mentioned, and it is nothing but a cyst.
E la generacio de aquest hernia es per debelitat la qual accideys als genetius, per que ad aquels es efundunda aquesta materia, e alcunas vetz accideys per percuscio fayta sobre les genetius.	The formation of this hernia occurs due to the weakness that affects some testicles, leading to the protrusion of this material, and sometimes it can also be caused by a blow or injury to the testicles.
E aquesta humiditat es havent motas colors, quar la color de lu o es declinant a citrina o a sanguinent, o rog, o es negra feculenta, o es ayguosa blanqua, e es aquo que es mays.	This fluid can have different colours; it may be the colour of pus or tend towards yellow or blood-red, or it could be muddy and dark, watery white, and this is the most common type.
E les senhals per les quals es saubut on es aquesta agreguacio de aygua so aquestz: quar si es en le ciphac blanc le qual havem dit, lahoras le apostema es redon declinant un pauc a longitut ayssi cum figura de huou, e appar le genetiu, quar la humiditat conte aquel de tota part.	The signs that indicate the presence of this accumulation of fluid are as follows: when it is in the tunica vaginalis mentioned earlier, then the abscess will have a round shape and slightly elongate like a testicle, with one testicle appearing, while the fluid surrounds it completely.
E si la humiditat es en le propri pannicol, lahoras le apostema es redon am partida del huou e per aysso hom estima que es autre huou.	And if the moisture is within its own abdominal membrane, then the abscess is considered to be near the testicle and therefore thought to be another one.
E si la humiditat es entre la codena dels genetius e·l ciphac blanc, lahoras catz dejos le centiment.	And if the moisture is between the muscle of the pubis and the white part above the penis, then we measure its size.
E cum tu vols la cognicio de la color de la humiditat, lahoras tu esproa la color de la humiditat en le apostema am entromes cayrat del qual la forma es precedida; e segon aquo que es eyssit en le vestigi del entromes, jutga de aquo que es dedintz lu.	When you want to know the color of the moisture, observe the color of the pus in the abscess with a small probe whose shape precedes it; and according to what is seen on the surface, judge what must be inside.
Donc quan nos vinem a la curacio de lu am ferr, lahoras cove que comandem al malaute que sia fleubotomat si aquo es a tu possibla, e vezes le cos de lu ple.	Therefore, when we come to the treatment with iron [instruments], it is necessary that we command the patient to be bloodlet if this is possible for you, and empty their body.
E aprop sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos sobre alcuna causa un pauc auta, e pausa dejos lu motz draps.	Then have him lay face down on some sort of high table, and place many sheets underneath him.
E aprop setz tu sobre la part sinistra de lu, e comanda al ministra que segua a la dextra de lu, le qual extenda la sua vergua a hun de dos latz a la codena dels genetius e a la partida del mirac del ventre.	Then sit on the left side of him, and command the assistant to be at his right, who stretches out their arm in one of two directions towards the pubis and the lower abdomen.
E aprop pren spatum lat e scindeys la codena dels genetius del mieg loc per la longitut entro prop le pentenilh.	And then take a wide spatula and divide the genital region of the patient's inner thigh along its length until the pubic bone.
E sia fayta la seccio segon rectetut engualment distant de la linha que deveseys la pel dels genetius, entro que pervengua al ciphac blanc comprehendent.	Make the incision according to prescription at an equal distance from the line that separates the hair of the genitals, so it reaches up to the white part (the penis).
E excorja aquel, e observa, e guarda te per aysso que tu no inscidas aquel; e la tua excoriacio am la qual aquel excorjas per partida jassia que sia suspenduda am le huou mays e subtilment escruta am la excoriacio segon la quantitat a tu possibla.	Scrape that, and observe it carefully to ensure you do not injure yourself during the scraping process; also, be mindful of how much skin you scrape off as this should be suspended over the largest and most subtle incision for examination.
E aprop perfora le ciphac ple de aygua am perforacio ampla, e extratz tota l’aygua.	Then pierce the penis full of water with a wide-gauge needle, and drain all its fluids.
E aprop separa entre doas labias de la seccio am uncis, e exten le ciphac a las partidas desus; e no toques la codena les genetius comprehendent, e inscideys le ciphac en aquela manieyra que es a tu possible.	And now separate the two labia of the incision with hooks and spread apart the penis itself; do not touch the genital area, and make an incision on the penis in any way that is feasible to you.
E inscideys aquel am la sua totalitat o en pessas, e majorment le sieu latz subtil, quar si tu no perscrutas exquisidament la inscizio de lu, no es fayta segurtat que la aygua no retorne.	Make the incision either along its entire length or in pieces, especially on its thinnest side because if you do not examine the incisions thoroughly, there is a chance that fluids will return.
Mays si le huou procezeys de aquela defora de la sua codena en la ora de la tua operacio, lahoras quan tu auras complida la seccio del ciphac, retorna dedintz aquel, e aprop ajusta las doas labias de la codena dels genetius am sutura, e aprop cura aquel ayssi cum las autras plagua, entro que sia sanat.	If the wound is outside of its original bounds when you start the operation, once you have completed the section on the scrotum, return to it and adjust the two labia of the genital region with sutures; then treat this as any other wound until cured.
E si atrobas le huou corromput per autra malautia, lahoras cove que tu lies les vayssels les quals so sore le suspensori, e extrat le huou, e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit.	If the wound has been corrupted by another disease, then you must tie off the vessels above the scrotum and extract it; treat this as previously described.
Mays si l’aygua es agreguada en doas partidas esemps, lahoras sapias que doas son las ernias; donc inscideys aquela partida segon que has feyt en l’autra engualment; e si es a tu vist que sia una opera, lahoras tu la fay.	But if water appears in two separate places, you know that there are two hernias present. Therefore, follow the same procedure as with the other one and incise it accordingly; and if it is clear to you that this should be operated on, then do so.
E aprop tu abstergiys le sanc, e entramet en las seccios lana submersa en oli o en oli rozat; e pausa deforo autra lana la qual tu as submersa en vi e oli, e expandeys aquela sobre dos genetius e·l mirac del ventre; e pausa desobre draps doblatz e pulvils, e lia aquels desobre am liament le qual es segon aquesta forma:	Then clean the blood away and pack the incision with lint soaked in oil or rose oil; place over this another piece of lint that has been soaked in wine and oil, extending it from one genital region to the other and covering the navel. Then lay over this some folded linen cloths and apply a bandage as follows:
e aprop sian preses dos draps e sian humplitz de lana carmenada segon aquesta semblansa; e sian faytas las extremitatz am les quals es premut de coto o de lana humida, e sian agreguatz am strectura en le braguier de las braguas, e la una de las extremitatz prengua del cul entro al dos, e la segonda prengua a la partida del pantenilh, e dos extramitatz sobre dos coyssas dejos e dos extramitatz autras sobre dos angonars, e tota extrictura sia ajustada en le braguier de las braguas.	And then take two cloths and wet them with crimson wool prepared according to this likeness; the ends are to be bound with cotton or damp wool, and they are attached firmly in the scrotum area of the underpants, one end behind the buttocks at the back, and the other in front at the belt loop. The two ends should then be placed over each thigh and two more ends over the testicles themselves; all the straps must be adjusted tightly inside the underpants.
E alcunas veguadas aquesta hernia es medicada artificialment am cauteri en loc de seccio am ferr; e es que tu prenguas cauteri cutellar subtil e que inscidas am aquel la codena dels ginitius, e es ignit segon que havem recomtat entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc contenent la aygua, e lahoras tu pren cauteri segon aquesta forma:	E alcunas veguadas aquesta hernia es medicada artificialment am cauteri en loc de seccio am ferr; e es que tu prenguas cauteri cutellar subtil e que inscidas am aquel la codena dels ginitius, e es ignit segon que havem recomtat entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc contenent la aygua, e lahoras tu pren cauteri segon aquesta forma:
e es asemblat a letra greca.	e es asemblat a letra grega.
E aprop perfora am aquel ciphac, e es ignit entro que tota la humiditat sia fora-gitada.	And then pierce it with that probe, and ignite it until all moisture is driven out.
E aprop exten le ciphac am uncis, e excorja am uncis, e excorja am cauteri subtil ignit; e inscideys aquel segon que es a tu possible entro que eradiques tot lu; e guarda te del huou que·l foc no·l toque.	And then extend the probe with hooks, scrape it with hooks, and gently scrape it with an ignited cautery; incise it as deeply as you can to eradicate everything; be careful that the bone is not touched by fire.
E sapias que aquesta operacio es pus salva e pus longinqua de flux de sanc, e milhor que operacio am seccio.	Know that this operation is safer and farther from the flow of blood, and better than an operation with a section.
Mays si a tu fa contrarietat apostema caut en la hora de seccio o en hora de cauteri, o flux de sanc, lahoras cove que tu cures qual contrarietat fa a tu per aquo, am curacio la qual conveneys a lu segon que es dit.	But if abscess occurs during the time of section or cautery, or there is bleeding, then you should treat this complication as it arises with the appropriate cure as described.
Mays si le malaute es pauruc, e no spera la segonda operacio per la sua horribilitat, lahoras administra perforacio segon que yeu recomti aquo; e es quan es certificat deves tu, per aquo que havem dit de las significacios, que aquela hernia es ayguosa.	If the patient is afraid and cannot endure a second operation due to its severity, then administer perforation as I recommend; this is when it has been confirmed, based on what we have discussed about the signs, that the hernia is watery.
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute sobre alcuna cezelha elevada, aprop perfora le apostema en la partida pus bassa de lu am spatum lat, e pausa la perforacio segon la longitut del cos.	Make sure you position the patient on an elevated pillow, then pierce the abscess in its lowest part with a broad spatula, and make the incision according to the length of their body.
E sia la apercio ampla entro que corro tota l‘aygua.	And let the incision be wide enough that it drains all the fluid.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc coto e lia aquel e layssa aquel, per so que corro le romanent de l’aygua.	Then place something over the spot for a while, letting it sit there to allow any remaining fluid to drain.
E aprop cura aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	And then take care of that area until the wound is completely healed.
Mays si contrarietat es a la egrecio de l’aygua en aquela hora tu perforas aquela: e aquo no es fayt sino per aquo quar le pannicol blanc en le orrifici de la plagua fa contrarietat e prohibeys le eyssiment de l’aygua, lahoras cove que tu metas en la plagua pena o instrument am la qual es extrayta l’aygua dels ydropitz, la forma del qual es precedida; o ajusta en la opprecio de la plagua un petit.	But if there is any difficulty in draining the fluid at that time, you must make an incision: this is not done except because the white layer of fat around the opening of the wound causes difficulty and prevents the release of the fluid. In such a case, insert into the wound a feather or some other instrument by which water is drawn out according to the established practice; or apply a small suction cup over the wound.
E sapias que l’aygua retorna, e es agueguada aprop vi meses o enaviro aquels; e cum es agreguada, lahoras sia perforat segon aquela meteyssa manieyra, quar le malaute ayssi passara les sieus dias.	And know that if the fluid returns, and this is done after about six months or so; and when it reoccurs, then make another incision in the same manner, for the patient will suffer as long as such things continue.
Capitol .lxiii.	The information you provided is already in the format of chapter headings or titles. Is there another text or sentence I can translate for you?
De seccio sobre hernia carnosa e la curacio de lu.	On incisions made on fleshy hernias, and their cure." 
Sapias que en la seccio sobre aquesta hernia es temor perdusent a pernicia en las majors disposicios; per que a mi es vista la dimissio de lu e esser salvat per aquela milhor.	Know that in the section regarding this hernia, there is fear of potential harm due to its severity; thus, in my opinion, it would be best to release him and seek salvation through another method.
E yeu so rememorant la operacio en aquela e las specias dels apostemas.	I recall the operation, specifically mentioning the types of abscesses that were present.
Donc, dic que l‘apostemas natz en les cos dels quals les genetius so conponutz e es fayt aquo per motas causas: o per superfluitat aguda agra, la qual es efundida als genetius, o per percuscio.	Therefore, I state that abscesses occur in parts of the body where the flesh is composed loosely and are caused by several factors: either due to an excess of acrid humours which infiltrate into the flesh, or because of injury.
E es la color de la apostema segon la color del cos, e no es atrobat en lu dolor, e es apostema greu.	And the colour of this abscess is like that of the body part it affects; there is little pain associated with it and it's considered a severe type.
E fort leu es apostema lapificada, del qual la color es fosca, e no es centiment a lu.	Rarely is an abscess petrified, which appears dark in colour; it's not common to feel any pain from this.
E alcunas veguadas es fayt per nodacio de las arcerias, e per imflacio de aquelas ayssi quo ja es perceubut la rememoracio de lu, o per imflacio de venas.	Sometimes abscesses form due to blockage of the arteries or because of swelling that can be perceived when one remembers the injury, or even through inflammation of veins.
Mays aquo que es per imflacio de arcerias es conogut per la dispercio de la apostema quan compremas aquela am les tieus ditz; e no cove que aquel toques.	In cases where an abscess is caused by the inflammation of arteries, it's known that when one applies pressure on it with their fingers, it disperses and does not require any further contact.
Mays aquel que es fayt per imflacio de vena no es dispergut de lu alcuna causa deves la compressio am les ditz.	But for him who is afflicted by the inflammation of a vein, do not remove him from any cause whatever on account of compression.
E ja es possible que sobre aquesta specia sia fayta seccio e sobre les autres carns; e es que tu inscida la codena dels genetius, e aprop esten le huou a las partidas desus, e extratz aquel del ciphac blanc, e deliura le suspensori dels vaysels, e ligua les, e inscideys le suspensori pus que tu deliuras aquel de tota partida de las partidas del huou.	And it is possible that an incision can be made on this type of injury and on the other flesh; you must cut the cord of the genitals, then open up the scrotum, extract the white substance from it, free the spermatic vessels, tie them off, and cut the suspending membrane so as to remove everything contained within the testicle.
Donc si l’huou ja es am aquelas carnadas consolida, lahoras cove que tu extraguas le huou e inscidas aquel.	So if the testicle has already hardened in this condition, then you must remove the testicle and cut it out.
E si es adherencia entro alcuna causa del ciphac, o entre aquo que es entre les bayssels, lahoras cove que tu deliures tota aquela adherencia e inscidas aquela per inscizio redonda.	And if there is any adhesion of the white substance due to some other cause or what lies between the blood vessels, then you must free all such adhesions and cut them away by making a circular incision.
Mays si es nativitat de carn en le loc de la adherencia la qual es detras, lahoras cove que tu inscidas tot aquo que es de lu, e extraguas le huou ayssi cum havem dit.	But if there is a birth of flesh in the place of adhesion which occurs from behind, then you must cut away all that belongs to it and remove the testicle as we have said.
Donc cum es complida la tua operacio, lahoras omple la plagua de lana imfuza en oli rozat e vi; e aprop cura aquela am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	Once your operation is complete, fill the wound with lint soaked in rose oil and wine; then treat it with another cure until it is healed.

De la curacio de hernia que es de vitz.	De la curacio de hernia que es de vitz.
Vit es apostema envolut per alcuna envolucio semblant a broto am mollificacio dels testiculs, e es fayt dificil movement exercitiu e deambulacio sobre le malaute.	Vit is an abscess enclosed by some wrapping similar to a swelling with softening of the testes, and it makes physical exercise and walking difficult for the patient.
E en la curacio de aquesta malautia es per temor per aquo del qual es precedida rememoracio.	And in treating this illness, fear is often present due to the memory of previous occurrences.
Empero cove que diguam opperacio en aquela segon que fero les primiers.	However, let us call this operation as it was done by the first ones.
E dic que cove que fassas sezer le malaute sobre una cezelha elevada; e aprop enpelleys le suspensori dels testiculs a las partidas dejos; e aprop te la codena dels genetius am les tieus ditz am les baysels que so probdas a la vergua; e tengua aquels autre ministre que tu, e extenda aquels am extencio vehement.	You should place the patient on an elevated bed and then remove the scrotum from its base and take out the spermatic cords with your fingers or some small tweezers that you have tested on the penis; also make sure to have those other tools ready, and stretch them vigorously.
E aprop inscideys am spatum lat agut per seccio traversa en le dreyt dels vaysels entro que sian les vayssels descubertz.	Then, use a sharp thin spatula to cut the vessels transversely until they are exposed.
E aprop excorja de tota partida ayssi quo a tu havem dit en extraccio de arceria las quals so en las templas.	After that, remove all parts as I have told you before when extracting an arch in the temples.
E aprop fica en aquelas un’agulha en la qual sia fiel doble, e lia aquel en le primier del locs en les quals accideys vit, e lia aquel autra veguada en le derier de lor.	Then, place a needle with a double thread in those places where you find the abscess and tie it first at the front of the wound and then again at its back.
E aprop inscideys aquels en le mieg loc per seccio dreyta segon la longuesa del cos, e extratz aquo que es agreguat de las humiditatz fetulentas e corruptas.	And then make an incision in that spot with a straight section according to the length of the body, and extract what has accumulated from the fetid and corrupted humors.
E aprop cura la plagua am curacio de las autras plaguas en las quals vols sania esser engendrada per so que caian les vaysels les quals noyreysso un de dos genetius, quar no es mal per aquo.	Then treat the wound with the cure for other similar wounds where you want to promote healing by filling the veins with either of two types of substances; this is not harmful.
Mays si accideys vit a totz les bayssels, lahoras cove que·ls testicols sian extragutz o que les testicols per aquo se cequo am les vayssels, per que sia privat de tot nutriment per la inscizio dels vayssels, e que sian estaborits, o que cequo per so que no sia juvament am aquels.	But if it happens that all the veins are affected, then it is necessary to remove the testicles or to sever the testicles from the veins, so they are deprived of all nourishment due to the incision of the veins and are rendered impotent, or so that they do not benefit them.

De la cura de hernia entestinal.	On the treatment of an intestinal hernia." 
Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquela ruptura ad alcu dels budels.	Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquella ruptura ad alcu dels budels: The occurrence of this hernia is due to an incision that begins in the diaphragm extending over the abdomen from the lower abdominal muscles. This causes a rupture which then involves some of the intestines.
E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.	E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.: "This rupture can occur either in the diaphragm or through its rupture. It happens due to various causes such as percussion, jumping, shouting, lifting heavy objects, or any similar activity.
E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel.	E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel: "The sign of this condition is that it occurs gradually over time when there's an extension of the diaphragm. It does not happen suddenly and leads to an abscess between the chest and abdomen as the diaphragm compresses the intestine.
E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtament; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac.	E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtamente; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac: "The sign is different when the hernia results from an incision of the diaphragm. It causes severe pain suddenly at first; afterward, there appear diverse abscesses below the upper part of the abdomen due to intestine protrusion and the body's parts outside the diaphragm.
E alcunas veguadas es fora-getat am le budel la tela, e es apelada aquesta hernia entestinal zirbal.	And sometimes the intestine or hernia is left outside, and this condition is called an inguinal hernia.
E alcunas veguadas es fayta am ventositat, e alcunas veguadas corr en le budel fenda, e aqui es retenguda, e es am aquo gran pernitia3 del malaute, e alcunas veguadas fa endevenir dolor malvada e majorment quan es premut.	And sometimes air is trapped inside, and in some cases, it runs through the intestine or hernia, gets caught there, causing great harm to the patient's health, and sometimes induces severe pain especially when pressure is applied.
E en la curacio de las especias de aquesta malautia am ferr es temor, per que cove que sia esquivat le cazament en aquela.	In the treatment of this condition with iron, there is fear due to the risk of infection.
E la manieyra de la operacio de aquela es que comandes al malaute que redugua le budel am la sua ma a las partidas dedintz de la sua conquavitat si obezeys al sieu retornament, e aprop sia envessat sobre le sieu col entre las tuas mas, e eleva las cambas de lu.	The way to perform the operation for this condition is to instruct the patient to gently push the intestine or hernia back into its cavity using their own hand if it can be reached inside. Then it should be placed over their neck between your hands, and their legs lifted.
E aprop sten la codena la qual siec la codena dels testicols a las partidas desus, e inscideys la codena dels testicols tota per le lonc; e aprop fiqua en doas labias de la seccio uncis segon que indigeysses a hubrir la seccio am aquels.	Then tie the cord that supports the testicles above, and make an incision in the cord of the testicles completely along its length. Then place two hooks into the edges of the incision as required to open up the section with these.
E si’ la seccio segon la quantitat que a tu sia possible que de aquela le huou sia foro-getat.	And if there is any possibility that the sac has been left outside, open up the section as much as you can.
E aprop excorja aquela ciphaqueth les quals so dejos la codena dels testicols, entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc dur de quascuna partida.	And then remove that scrotal sac which is under the chain of testicles, while ensuring that the white hard membrane on both sides is uncovered.
Lahoras tu entromet le tieu dit en aquo que siec le testicol, en aquo que es entre ciphac blanc, le qual es dejos la codena del huou, e entre le ciphac segon, e absolve am aquel’adherencia que es en la partida detras del huou.	Then insert your finger into what is the testicle, which is between the white membrane, located below the string of seeds, and between the second membrane, detaching any adhesions found behind the cord.
E aprop mau am la ma la codena dels testicols a las partidas deforo, e am aysso exten le ciphac blanc en sus am la ma sinestra, e eleva le huou am le ciphac a la partida de la seccio; e comanda al ministre que extenda le huou ensus e tu dissolveys la adherencia que es detras am solucio complida.	And grab the string of testicles with your hand, pulling them outward, and stretch the white membrane upwards using your left hand, lifting the cord towards the section above; instruct the assistant to pull on the cord upward as you fully detach the adhesions behind it.
E cerqua am les tieus ditz que lay no sia alcuna causa del budel envelopat en le ciphac blanc dur.	Check with your fingers that there is no hernia encased in the hard white membrane.
Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.	Should you find any cause for concern, push it back into the abdomen.
E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.	Then take a needle that has been made thick with ten wires and insert it below the posterior end of the membrane, which is located just beneath the string of testicles, at its section; now incise both ends that protrude from the wire until you have four wires, then twist some of them into a cross-like figure; tie this to the membrane we mentioned earlier, which lies under the string of testicles, securely on two sides.
E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.	And then, wrap the ends of the bile ducts and tie them tightly with a strong ligature to prevent any cause from passing through these vessels that could result in an abscess.
E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.	Place another binding ligature according to the pattern of the first one, but three fingers away from it; leave this second ligature and the initial one at a distance equal to the width of the index finger above the chain of testicles, then incise all that remains following its roundness, and remove the member.
E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.	Then, incise at the point below the chain of testicles by cutting it in half from which blood and serum will flow just as we have described before.
E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.	Apply the linen cloth soaked in oil on the wound; apply the binding ligature we have described (and sometimes the white cautery is used, which we mentioned after the incision of the member to stop the flow of blood, since this happens often) and leave the binding until it falls off by itself.
Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.	But if the healing is delayed, then apply warm water poultices, and place them on it until they fall off as we have said.
E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.	Then treat the plague with another method of treating wounds until it is healed.

De hernia ventosa.	Here is my translation: 
En aquesta hernia no e vist alcu que sia estat ardit sus la curacio de lu am ferr.	In this hernia, I have not seen anyone who has been cured by using an iron instrument.
E les primiers diyssero que es fayta ayssi cum havem recomtat en la hernia que es am vi; la qual es que tu lies les vayssels aprop la seccio sobre aquela am fecilitat de lu; e aprop secca en le mieg loc en enviro le apostema am aquo que obro aquel, entro que caian les vayssels.	And the first doctors said that it is caused like we have explained in this hernia I saw, which is when you accidentally cut the vessels near the section and then dried the wound with something hard on the abscess' site, while the vessels were still open.
E cura la plagua segon que havem dit entro que sia sanada.	Treat the plague as we have mentioned until it is cured.

De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.	Regarding the incision that is made in the armpits.
Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.	Some cases involve rupture or inflammation in the armpits as mentioned before, causing swelling of the area.
E no deyssen als genetius alcuna causa dels budels al genetius; e si deyssen, aquo es pauc; e retorna s’en en totas horas.	And they (the doctors) do not say that there is any specific cause for hernias at the genitals; and if they do mention one, it's a minor factor; and it returns (the hernia) in all cases.
Mays si es prolonguat le temps am aquo, es ajustada fissura en le ciphac entro que deysenda le budel en le ciphac; e accideys aquo per la extencio del ciphac le qual es en le angonars ayssi cum havem dit, la qual causa es quar le ciphac es estendut, e aprop es mollificat e·l loc es apostemat e emineys. In some cases, it is cured with an iron according to this method: have the patient lie down on their back with their hands placed between their thighs, and then dry the place of the rupture where the prominent abscesses are by making a transverse incision about three fingers wide.
E aprop strenh le ciphac blanc que es jos la codena entro que sia descubert.	Then hold the white cloth, which is beneath the chain, firmly until it is uncovered.

E aprop cus le dos locs eminentz sobre la extremitat del ray del ciphac, e ajusta am la sutura un de aquels am l’autre.	Then sew the two protruding parts together on the tip of the reed with the cloth, bringing them close to each other.
E aprop extratz la extremitat del ray, e no inscidas del ciphac de tot, ni no extenda le huou, ni autra causa ayssi cum yeu te fi saber en la curacio de hernia entestinal.	Then remove the end of the reed and do not draw out any part of the cloth from it completely, nor stretch the membrane (peritoneum), or cause anything else that may occur during the treatment of an intestinal hernia.

Then treat it with the method for wounds, and when you cut into the pus, clean it and restore the wound until it is healed; because the cloth has contracted and the protrusion of the rupture does not fit anymore.
E cauteri es milhor en aquest loc, quar es pus propda a salut.	And cauterization is better in this location because it is closer to health.

De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.	On the softening of the cord of the testes.
Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.	In some men, the cord of the testes is softened because the tissues between them become relaxed, and it is known that this can be a problem.
Adonc necessari es ad aquel que es preguat en la curacio de lu que fassa jazer le malaute segon le sieu dos, e enscida tota la codena la qual es mollificada sobre la codena natural; e aprop que ajuste doas labias am la sutura.	It is necessary for the person treating this condition to make the patient lie on his side and draw up the entire cord that has been softened above the natural cord, then they should join together the two lips with a suture.
E si vols, cus en le comensament la superfluitat de la codena mollificada am tres cozeduras o quatre e am ferma sutura.	And if you wish, cut off the excess of the softened cord with three or four stitches and close it with a firm suture.
E aprop inscideys entre las suturas; e aprop cura per curacio de las autras plaguas entro que sia sanat e caian les fiels.	Then incise between the stitches, and treat any other wounds until they are healed and the urine flows freely.
